description:
A local street gang has challenged Dot to a drag race!  
Make sure Dot gets a good start!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on red lights then yellow lights then green lights.

hints.description: Drag out 3 lights and use Auto cues to link them in this order: Red then Yellow then Green.

puzzles.description: Change the yellow light to a brave sound. Make Dot say "Ready, set, go!" after the red light.

hints.description: Drag the Yellow light to the trash.
Add a brave sound between the Red and Green lights. Set the sound to "Ready, set, go!"

puzzles.description: After turning on green lights, make Dot automatically play the tire squeal sound.

hints.description: Drag out a vehicle sound. Set the sound to Tire Squeal. Link the sound with an Auto cue.
